snippet.title: United Penguin Kingdom Huddle Up Steam Trailer
snippet.description: A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins. Enjoy the growth of your settlement, become the king, and lead the United Penguin Kingdom.

localized.title: United Penguin Kingdom Huddle Up Steam Trailer
localized.description: A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins. Enjoy the growth of your settlement, become the king, and lead the United Penguin Kingdom.
